attributes.action: Claim back all expenses from G4S for Olympics security they fail to provide
attributes.additional_details:
All costs incurred by Government to cover the security that G4S have failed to provide should be paid for by G4S out of the £200 million plus they are being paid.
Government costs should include the extra troops, Police, transport and accommodation  that now have to be paid for to cover G4S failure to meet their contract.  Why should the public have to pay more money to cover a greedy company's failure to provide what it was contracted to do. G4S to be fined for breach of contract.
